creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by the artist with the assistance of Keiko Gallery
description: brown and white bud-shaped form with long slit beginning at the bulbous base, flaring to open top; outside of form is brown and white with incised lines; interior of form is brilliant teal blue; front of base is concave; sgraffito on the slip, iron inlay in the groove; hand built
signed:
Signature

on bottom of base, etched in clay medium
title: Shell, 11-incubate-b
